pages.text: (Oh Muhammad, SAW), this book is revealed to you, not to cause you any distress. Rather, with it you may warn (the unbelievers) and remind the believers
(Tell them), "Follow that which has been revealed to you by your Lord, and do not (accept or) follow any other patron besides Him. Seldom do you bear (that) in mind
Many towns have We destroyed! Our punishment came upon them at night (when they slept), or while they napped (during the day)
Then, when Our punishment landed on them, what rang on their lips was nothing but (a confession of guilt); "We really were the wrongdoers
(On the Day of Judgment) We will definitely call to account (all) those to whom We sent the messengers, and We will surely ask the messengers as well
Then, We would narrate to them everything with a definite (and specific) knowledge. We were (really) never absent ever
That day, truth (alone) shall carry weight. Only such ones whose scales (of good deeds) weigh heavier, would be successful
While the ones whose scales weigh lighter would be the losers. They had squandered themselves, because they used to unjustly (and willfully) deny Our signs (and Our revelations)
We certainly entrusted you with power (and authority) in the world, and here We provided means for your livelihood. Little do you thank

We certainly created you, and then gave you (a human) form. Then, We said to the angels, "Prostrate before Adam (in homage)." They all bowed down (to the ground) except Iblees _ (the Shaitan). He was not among those who fell prostrate
